articles.title: Joule to Integrate with Microsoft Copilot | SAP Sapphire - SAP News
articles.description: SAP is bringing its generative AI copilot Joule together with Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 for deep bi-directional integration.
articles.content:
Today at SAP Sapphire, we announced plans to bring our generative AI copilot Joule together with Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365.
